author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Video Piracy Cell of St. Thomas Mount Unit and Chennai Unit-I along with Enforcers of Intellectual Property Rights carried a series of raids at various shops in Chennai selling bags with the popular American Tourister brand.

Price

The shops were selling the bags at a lesser price. A spokesperson from EIPR, who tipped off the police and assisted in the raid said:

“We have been carrying an investigation regarding the fake bags being circulated in the market. In fact, these raids were carried in five days at three various places.” Police arrested Sitheek Syed Isabulla (43), Ramakrishnan Mahalingam (59) and Fularam Valaramji (26).
title: Video piracy cell seizes fake bags from shops
